long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the companion extension to The Stack Website (https://thestack.es). 

We will help you automatize manual work related finding good leads for your company in Linkedin, based on a series of criteria, so you can use this data wherever (CRM, email, etc). It can 
*  manually download Linkedin profiles that you input
* pull them from your Linkedin contacts
* run Linkedin searches to get profiles
